divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my back porch on the third floor with my brother his girl friend and an old friend of ours. I first notice the object when i was looking up at the night sky. at first i thought it was a plane then i thought it was a satellite but the shape was all wrong. the object was moving very fast in a straight line towards the beach. it was red in color and it had a strange pattern on its Surface that was not light up. i lost sight of it when it went past the trees.
Summary: 4 people saw a redish triangular Object moving south towards dane street beach
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Beverly
There was one other sighting in Beverly on or around August 23rd 2013
